document_data.name: House Goldfeather
document_data.mainbody: House '''Goldfeather''' was a [[Cormyr]]ian noble house whose last living noble was executed for treason by [[Dhalmass Obaskyr|King Dhalmass]] in [[1191 DR]].
document_data.History:
All of their property, including the hunting lodge called [[Stag Steads]] was forfeited to the crown.

In [[1442 DR]], the house was ennobled again by [[Azoun V|King Azoun V]]. The Goldfeathers further enhanced their ties to the crown when Prince [[Irvel Obarskyr]] married Ospra, the daughter of the House's leader.{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail|6}}
